Klasse GameStateDTO

java.lang.Object
dto.GameStateDTO
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
Serializable
public class GameStateDTO extends Object implements Serializable
This class is used to encapsulate and transmit information about the current game state, including player data, which player's turn it is, and whether the game is currently active.
Siehe auch:

  • Konstruktordetails

    • GameStateDTO

      public GameStateDTO(List<PlayerDTO> players, int currentPlayerIndex, boolean isactive)
      Constructs a new GameState with the given player list, current player index, and activity flag.
      Parameter:
      players - the list of players in the game.
      currentPlayerIndex - the index of the current player in the list.
      isactive - whether the game is currently active

  • Methodendetails

      The list of players participating in the game.

      the current player index.

    • isActive

      public boolean isActive()
      Indicates whether the game is currently active.
      Gibt zurück:
      if the game is active ; and false otherwise.
